item.title: Part 0x01: Creating custom printf()
item.description:
In this blog, we will develop our own printf function, and of course with some limitation. The goal of creating our own printf function is to gain a better grasp of how it works and to have more control over the output of your applications.

Alert ðŸš¨ To summarize, while it is feasible to develop a function similar to printf without using the printf() function, it would be a time consuming effort, and the existing printf() function provides a reliable and well-tested implementation.
